primary_function: Mapping and cartographic standardization for Densworld; expedition oversight; protocol development
notable_members: Prebel (Guild Master); Kerith Moll (Guild Master Assessor); Vagabu Olt (Associate)
key_documents: Dens Principles; Yeller Protocols (Appendix C); Proscribed Coordinates (Appendix D); Form 17-B
notes: Primary mapping authority. Three-Compassed system maintained. No East on official maps.

primary_function: Trade route management; merchant certification; census coordination via Village Clerks
notable_members: Foreman Hask (Trade Route Master); Administrator Venn (Census); Lurra Venn (Pattern analyst)
notes: Commercial focus. Journey archetype research (Lurra Venn) controversial among membership.

primary_function: Mathematical research; peer review; scholarly correspondence
notes: Received Pollus Brent's creature grammar letter. Maintains correspondence network.

primary_function: Creature classification; specimen collection; taxonomic debate
notable_members: Hesta Vorn (SCH-012 - leading taxonomist); Pollux Dann (deceased); Renna Caw
notes: Lab-based tradition. Limited field observation capacity. Hesta Vorn's surveys authoritative.
Elite institution. Interdisciplinary work. Twenty-Ten skeptics sometimes evaluate claims.
Controversial after Expedition A-3 failure (Year 916). Opponents question methodology.

primary_function: Expedition oversight; permit issuance; disaster investigation
notes: Administrative oversight. Works with Cartographer's Guild on expedition planning.

primary_function: Tower defensive formation during Siege of Mirado
notable_members: The Colonel; Mell (First); Gretl (Second); Temmen (Third); Orgo (Fourth); Tormon (Fifth)
notes: Military structure. Tormon was Colonel's brother. Post-siege status unclear.
Employed the Colonel for Archivist work before military career. Current status unclear.
Required by Capital law. Quality varies by village. Rural data primary source.

primary_function: Military force assembled for Mirado siege
notes: The Colonel's army. See also Five Columns structure.

primary_function: Unofficial book collection and circulation outside Archive system
senate_recognition: NOT RECOGNIZED - operates outside official channels
notes: Underground collectors. Archive does not officially acknowledge. Swick known to authorities.
Where The Torturer tortured Yeller with ciphers. Official status unclear. May be informal designation.

primary_function: Assessment of scholarly claims and methods; calibration standards
notable_members: Vorn 'Scrap' Kellam; Pria Senth; Murchison 'Old Murch' Toller; Alna Vessk; Terrik Moss
notes: Skeptics collective. Meet at coffee shop. Valuable methodological service despite informal status.
Funds research including controversial prediction studies.
